projects.title: Typescript / React for Etecture
projects.description: ETECTURE GmbH is a Software development company in Karlsruhe. Supporting and taking development lead in various customer projects
achievements: Created a new build system (webpack)
Created a new starter kit
Created a docker Cluster with reverse proxy (traefik)
Created a NodeJs backend with Sequilize SQL and PostGres

projects.title: NodeJs / React for Gameforge
projects.description: Gameforge 4D is one of the biggest game publisher in Europe. Working together with Gameforge to create their new steam competitor.
achievements: Created middleware and microservices
Created Docker scripts
Implemented a global logging solution for microservices in container environment
PoC for migrating their web app from angular 1.x to react
Implemented a webpack job to dynamically inject configuration to the frontend at runtime

projects.title: NodeJs Development for Timify
projects.description: Timify is customer appointment manager for small businesses. I was helping on improving their microservices. Created unit-tests with Lab (HapiJs) and integration-tests with Postman. I created new templates for their automatic API-Documentation with Lout.
achievements: Refactored microservices
Created unit-tests with Lab
Created intergration tests with postman
Created new template for Lout (API documentation for HapiJs
Created a new mongo DB layer with promise support

projects.title: Angular 1.x Development for Cyber Manufaktur
projects.description: Development of various Angular 1.x components for Cyber Manufaktur GmbH
achievements: Created a webpack 1 build job for our angular 1.x project
Integrated JsPlump with angular 1.x to create a chart based on a json file
Created angular 1.x components for customers of Cyber Manufaktur GmbH
Some PHP & Wordpress development

projects.title: SendToKodi iOS App
projects.description: SendToKodi is a iOS App which resolves various video streams using youtube-dl to play them on kodi
achievements: Created a kodi-addon (python) which extracts video stream from websites urls with YoutubeDL
Created a Travis CI job which regularly re-builds the kodi-addon with a recent YoutubeDL version
Created a native iOS App with Swift which uses the integrated share option to send links to Kodi
Created a InApp Payment for multiple Hosts
The InApp Payment achieves about 15$ a quater which is enough to pay developer fee

Requirements engineering
Schema changes in Oracle SQL
Test driven development

Created mappings

Created documentations in confluence
Solved tickets from jira

projects.title: jQuery with Oracle Siebel OpenUI

projects.title: JavaEE WebApp with Oracle ADF
projects.description: „Stryker – New Sales Attribution Tool“: Planning, design and implementation of an JavaEE application for multi-na-tional (EMEA) and multi-lingual (English, German, French, Italian) Territory Management. Ec4u expert consulting covers all processes: Requirements and needs analysis, project lead and management, development, customizing, delivery and training.

Development of SOA interfaces to integrate Oracle Sales Cloud (Fusion CRM) with other legacy systems

Management and deployment for Oracle Java & Database Cloud Service
